lead_paragraph: Cassandra Giraldo began studying the youngsters’ world five years ago, concentrating on how they spent the time between school and home.

headline.main: Brooklyn Teenagers Capture a Photographer’s Eye

snippet: Cassandra Giraldo began studying the youngsters’ world five years ago, concentrating on how they spent the time between school and home.
abstract: Photographer Cassandra Giraldo says Brooklyn teens she documented for her After School Instagram project taught her a lot about her craft as well as about world of New York City teenagers.
